title: Crossbow Expert
content:
Gaping Wounds for twice as long, which I think is four turns When you attack with your Main Hand Crossbow, you can still do an off-hand attack as a Bonus Action. You shouldn't be near melee enemies when you're ranged attacking normally, but this allows you to do so with no penalty with Crossbows and Hand Crossbows.
